name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 20: The Dungeon RPG
synopsis: Eternal Quest is a lavish and engaging title that combines all the vital elements of the third person adventure genre into one perfectly formed product. There is stunning action, glorious combat, a host of magic spells to use and abuse and hordes of enemies to meet and massacre.   There is, of course, a brave and battle weary hero to guide to the ultimate prize of peace - and that's you!
